text: Since jdk 1.2, the "jar" command provides a "-i" option:-i  generate index information for the specified jar filesThis builds an index inside the jar that optimizies loading of resources in thejar and in the jars referred to with the Class-Path: attribute in the jar'smanifest file.Note that `-i' is mutually exclusive of c, x, or t and so should only be runnable separate from jar creation, extraction, or listing.
creator: eric@hfriedman.rdsl.lmi.net
